outputs.output_descr: At the invitation of the Liberia Ministry of Justice and at the request of the PDG Steering Group, a Consultant visited Liberia from NMay 2009 to assess the feasibility of providing technical assistance to enhance the capacities of the ministry of Justice to conduct investigations of criminal offenses including sexual and gender-based violent crimes. Partnering with the UNDP, the PDG pilot project will strengthen the capacity of the Police Academy and in particulary its Department of Training and Development, to coordinate, standardized and develop advanced, specialized trainings for the LNP including for the Women and Children's protection section (WCPS) to investigate criminal offfenses. The Project will enhance the capacity of the office of the insepctor General to coordinate internally and externally on training, fundraising and other strategic project.

project_title: PDG/OECD Capacity Support the Liberia National Police
